name: rock-wrecker
effect: Inflicts regular damage.  User loses its next turn to "recharge", and cannot attack or switch out during that turn.

flavor_text_entries.diamond-pearl:
The user launches a
huge boulder at the
foe to attack.
It must rest on the
next turn, however.
